Title: ChainBot - URL Shortener & QR Code Generator

Instantly shorten URLs and generate QR codes with one click. Copy and share shortened links effortlessly.

ChainBot is a lightweight, privacy-focused tool that combines URL shortening and QR code generation in one seamless experience.

Key Features:

- Instant URL Shortening: Automatically shortens the current tab's URL

- QR Code Generation: Creates high-quality, scannable QR codes

- One-Click Copy: Easily copy shortened URLs or QR codes to clipboard

- Clean Interface: Modern, dark-themed design for comfortable viewing

- Zero Configuration: Works instantly with no setup required

- Privacy Focused: No data collection or tracking

- Offline Capable: Generate QR codes without internet connection

- Universal Compatibility: Works with any URL

Perfect for:
✓ Social media sharing
✓ Professional presentations
✓ Marketing materials
✓ Quick mobile access
✓ Educational resources
✓ Business cards
✓ Digital signage
✓ Event promotion

How to Use:
1. Click the ChainBot icon while on any webpage
2. Get an instant shortened URL and QR code
3. Copy either with a single click
4. Share anywhere!

ChainBot streamlines your workflow by eliminating the need to visit multiple websites for URL shortening and QR code generation. Whether you're a professional, educator, or casual user, ChainBot makes sharing links easier than ever.

Free, fast, and friendly to use. Install ChainBot now and transform how you share links!
